idea-plugin.name: DepE Versions Exporter
idea-plugin.description: DepE -> Dependencies Exporter This Android Studio plugin allows you to export versions from module or whole project build files to separate versions.gradle file. It creates 'ext' closure where contains versions which are used it build files. To export versions navigate to Refactor -> Export Dependencies -> Choose module or project
idea-plugin.change-notes: First release - support exporting versions from modules to single versions.gradle file
